adHeader: 30 MINUTES FREE with your personal Holistic Nutrition Counselor
adDetails: What would it be worth to you to fix the biggest challenges in your overall health? What core-beliefs are stopping you from moving into the healthy, happy life you desire? As your personal nutritionist, I will listen to your needs and help you navigate the world of contradictory nutrition advice to determine what changes are necessary for you. A customized program is initiated and will not only show you how to lead a life full of energy, vitality, inner and outer awareness, joy and total wellness, but will teach and motivate you in making the big changes in all areas of your being that will last a lifetime. My name is Daisy and I am a board certified Holistic Health Practitioner, Empowerment Coach, and Intuitive Healer. My purpose is to help people overcome food addictions, eliminate digestive disorders, relieve depression and stress through natural foods and healing modalities. I create customized programs for each individual to ensure their success and I'm fully committed to the health and happiness of my clients. I'm offering a no-fee 30 minute health consultation on Skype to discuss how you can successfully lose weight and regain balance with a tailored-made weight loss program. http://www.pranarevive.com/free-consultation
